name: jest-testing-by-sample
description: Learn testing by sample using Jest, each of the samples contains a readme.md file that indicates the purpose of the sample plus an step by step guide to reproduce it.

scripts.start: env-cmd .env if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.build: env-cmd .env if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run build:prod || npm run build:dev
scripts.build:dev: rimraf dist && env-cmd .env cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --config ./config/webpack/app/dev.js
scripts.build:prod: rimraf dist && env-cmd .env cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack -p --config ./config/webpack/app/prod.js

author: Lemoncode
